snippet: Nearly four decades ago, Richard Migliore saw back-to-back Triple Crowns as a teenage exercise rider. He and many other fans are hoping to feel that magic again at Belmont Park on Saturday.
abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column relates conversation with Richard Migliore, former jockey who recalls being on the racetrack as a young boy in 1977 and 1978 when two horses won back-to-back Triple Crowns; notes that like many fans, Migliore is hoping to again feel the magic of Triple Crown victory as California Chrome prepares for the Belmont Stakes.
lead_paragraph: Nearly four decades ago, Richard Migliore saw back-to-back Triple Crowns as a teenage exercise rider. He and many other fans are hoping to feel that magic again at Belmont Park on Saturday.

headline.seo: Belmont Stakes Fans Hope for Overdue Triple Crown
headline.main: Wanting to Believe in California Chrome
headline.print_headline: Wanting to Believe in California Chrome
